column4: hi, i want to put ubuntu on my desktop computer.  if i burn an iso to a cd, will ubuntu boot from that cd?  can that cd partition my h ard drive?
yes it can :)
does it require admin privlages tensor?
I have downloaded and installed google chrome to their computers, so yes i can dl and install most things.
but when i restart the comp, its all gone cause the comp at school doesnt even have a hdd or a cd drive.. its etho booted
dr_willis: Lasers: i tried partitioning my computer and using wubi, and now all i get when i boot my computer is "j".  can ubuntu recover from that?
ACK wubi </3
yeah, cause if i try to even open the IE settings says blocked by admin
I cant even access the C: drive(even though its a fake one) inless i do some backdoor stuff. cant even go into CMD without having to do backdoor stuff.

haha, my into to networking teacher, has a script added to his router, so that if anyone tries to log in more than 3 times in a 24 hour period, it will send a script that will fry their processor and ram chips D:
intro*
what the heck? I cant access my router from this computer...192.168.1.254 doesnt do anything....
trying to access my router page, wont let me, saying too long for the connection...
just did an ifconfig, and im getting this.
Link encap:Ethernet  HWaddr 00:22:fb:7c:4c:38
so i tried 172.16.1.34 and nothing..
dr_willis: Lasers: i am certain is is J, not L.  all it shows is a lowercase j.  do i want 11.04 and 32-bit?
ahhhh, its 172.16.0.1
how much ram you got on ur system? 2gb minimum for 64bit
